content:
Hey @Ward Weistra i wanted to ask if there is a timeline when Fhirpath resolve() will be implemented into the Simplifier Stack?
I habe a lot of projects slicing on profile throwing out errors on the slicing.

Hi @Patrick Werner, we've just discussed with the Firely .NET SDK team that they are likely going to move this to the FHIR version agnostic (so not STU3/R4/R5 specific part of the library). Once that is done it will be easier for us to add to Simplifier.net. We've created a temporary workaround for hasValue(), but for resolve() this was too difficult.
Sorry for the trouble, but we're working on it. Do you have a ticket in the support desk? Then we're sure you will be notified once implemented.
